title: Minecraft 17w18a 发布
author: ruhuasiyu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 广药 于 2020-6-13 18:14 编辑 

每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。

然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。
适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.12 仍未发布，17w18a为其第10个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




离1.12又进一步了！
We're getting close to releasing 1.12 now, this weeks snapshot brings us even more bug fixes, some optimisations, and a couple of new Advancements.
我们离1.12越来越近了，这周的快照中我们修复了更多的bug，增加了一些新的进度，并做了一些优化。
Changes in snapshot 17w18a
快照17w18a的改动Added new advancements for taming and breeding animals
增加了驯服和繁殖动物的进度Had some serious words with the Narrator, it should work for more people now
为朗读者做了一些很认真的修复，现在可以为更多人工作了Changed the levitate advancement to 50 vertical blocks
改变获得漂浮进度的条件为50格竖直方块Changed the sniper duel advancement to horizontal distance
改变狙击手的对决进度的条件为水平距离Re-introduced announcements to chat when someone earns an achievement
重新加入了当玩家获得成就时在聊天框的推送Added new gamerule "announceAdvancements", defaults to true
新增游戏规则 "announceAdvancements"，默认为 trueChanged some map colours around again
修改了一些地图颜色Added a new /reload command to reload advancements & loot tables from disk
新增命令 /reload，用于重新从磁盘加载进度和可抢夺物品表Technical: Some optimisations to the recipe book
技术性：对配方书做了一些优化Technical: Optimized error conditions in command blocks
技术性：优化了命令方块的一些错误条件Technical: Added "tick" and "tame_animal" advancement triggers
技术性：增加了"tick"和"tame_animal"的进度判据类型Technical: Distance predicates in advancements now support: x, y, z, horizontal and absolute distance checking
技术性：现在可以在进度条件中指定距离的方向，包括 x,y,z, 水平和绝对距离Technical: Added "announce_to_chat" and "show_toast" booleans to the display info for advancements (both default true)
技术性：在进度中增加json标签 "announce_to_chat" 和 "show_toast" ，默认为 trueTechnical: Advancement loading is now strict json
技术性：现在进度的json必须是严格的

漏洞修复：
Fixed bug MC-113374 - Map colour palette changed (brown shade?)
地图颜色问题（棕色阴影）Fixed bug MC-114966 - Advancements overlap other advancements
进度覆盖在其它的进度上Fixed bug MC-115025 - Clicking on recipe or on book to close crafting help additionally clicks in inventory
点击配方或配方书以关闭合成帮助会导致在背包点击一次Fixed bug MC-115323 - Parrots spawn rarely in Jungle
鹦鹉在丛林过于罕见Fixed bug MC-115577 - Parrot play the flapping wings(fly) sound, when player push it
即使玩家推走了唱片机，鹦鹉仍然会保持挥翅膀的声音Fixed bug MC-115774 - Parrots still make sounds when they are on player shoulder and Silent:1b
即使拥有数据 Silent:1b ，鹦鹉在玩家肩膀依然能发出声音Fixed bug MC-115810 - Custom resourcepack added sounds not playing
自定义的资源包的声音不播放Fixed bug MC-115902 - Flying parrots will not avoid lava
飞翔的鹦鹉不会躲避岩浆Fixed bug MC-116482 - The server.properties file still has announce-player-achievements
server.properties文件依旧会推送玩家获得成就的通知Fixed bug MC-116498 - You can't place ladders on the back of stairs
无法在楼梯背面放置梯子Fixed bug MC-116515 - Placing a torch on a wall with a fence gate underneath causes crash
在栅栏门上方的墙上放置火把会导致崩溃Fixed bug MC-116534 - Pressing "Showing craftable" sometimes doesn't show any recipes
按下“显示可合成”按钮无效Fixed bug MC-116537 - Stopping jukebox music while a sitting parrot is dancing occasionally causes the parrot's entire upper body to be misplaced.
在鹦鹉跳舞时停止唱片机偶尔会导致鹦鹉的上半身错位Fixed bug MC-116574 - "showing craftable" option has several issues
“显示可合成”按钮有很多问题Fixed bug MC-116586 - Items in crafting grid disappear if the inventory is not properly closed
如果背包没有合适地关闭会导致工作台的物品消失Fixed bug MC-116670 - No toast is shown for first advancement made
获得第一个进度时不显示Toast(吐司提示)Fixed bug MC-116675 - Debug messages are printed in log when levitating
漂浮会在日志log显示调试信息Fixed bug MC-116713 - Creating new world with same name crashes with NullPointerException
创造新的同名世界会引起空指针异常NullPointerException的崩溃Added some new bugs!
增加了一些新特性(bug)
